Products.Name: Sprocket DynamoDB
Products.Description: The Sprocket CCOE approved DynamoDB for security and compliance requirements. Supports passing in the name of the table and the name of the index
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket Lambda
Products.Description: The Sprocket CCOE approved Lambda using Python for security and compliance requirements. Pass in the GitHub location of your Serverless code.
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket API Gateway for Lambda
Products.Description: The Sprocket CCOE approved Lambda API Gateway for security and compliance requirements. The API Gateway connects to a Sprocket Lambda and provides an addressable URL
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket Elastic Map Reduce
Products.Description: The Sprocket EMR CCOE approved for security and compliance requirements. The EMR cluster accepts the cluster name and key as parameters and runs on an mx3 xlarge ec2.
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket IAM Role for Sagemaker
Products.Description: The Sprocket Sagemaker IAM role is CCOE approved for security and compliance requirements. The IAM role grants the minimum necessary permissions for executing Sagemaker.
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket Lamp Server
Products.Description: The Sprocket Lamp Server is CCOE approved for security and compliance requirements. Create a LAMP stack using a single EC2 instance and a local MySQL database for storage. This installs the packages and files necessary to deploy the Apache web server, PHP, and MySQL.
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket RDS
Products.Description: The Sprocket RDS database is CCOE approved for security and compliance requirements. The RDS database accepts username and password as parameters.
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket Private S3 Bucket
Products.Description: The Sprocket Private S3 Bucket is CCOE approved for security and compliance requirements. The S3 bucket accepts the name of the bucket as a parameter.
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call

Products.Name: Sprocket SageMaker Notebook
Products.Description: The Sprocket Sagemaker Notebook is CCOE approved for security and compliance requirements. An Amazon SageMaker notebook instance is a machine learning (ML) compute instance running the Jupyter Notebook App. SageMaker manages creating the instance and related resources. Use Jupyter notebooks in your notebook instance to prepare and process data, write code to train models, deploy models to SageMaker hosting, and test or validate your models.
Products.SupportDescription: For support please use the Spacely Sprocket CCOE slack channel 8AM - 5PM earth time or for urgent issues refer to spacely-on-call
